answer: The study of the exclusive decay of heavy quarkonium is motivated by the desire to understand how gluons are converted into pions and to provide information about s-wave ππ scattering (hep-ph/0103225).
explanation: This paper directly addresses the exclusive decay of heavy quarkonium into a photon and two pions, providing insight into the conversion of gluons into pions and s-wave ππ scattering.
